isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - AUTO NEUTRAL OPTION

svcproc.title: AUTO NEUTRAL OPTION
svcproc.para: The optional auto neutral circuitry enables the transmission of the vehicle (typically a garbage compactor) to automatically shift into neutral when the parking brakes are applied. When the parking brakes are released, the transmission will automatically shift back into the drive mode.
